sections.heading: Securities; kinds authorized; pledge with Department of Banking and Finance
sections.text: Securities pledged pursuant to section 8-209 shall consist of any securities which constitute a legal investment for the trust company except for bills of exchange, notes, mortgages, banker's acceptances, or certificates of
